name: kellyservices
description: Since 1946, we've pioneered the staffing industry, connecting over 450,000 individuals annually with rewarding opportunities worldwide. Our deep expertise spans diverse industries, empowering us to match the right talent with the right roles, catalyzing personal growth and business success. With a global network of partners, we excel in enhancing lives through meaningful work while driving organizational excellence. Trust us to unite talent and opportunity like no other.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
tags: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Creating limitless opportunities, together
ShortDescription: Bringing expertise together with real partnership

Highlights.name: Direct Hire
Highlights.description: Kelly offers employers direct sourcing and hiring solutions to reduce recruiting time and cost while freeing up internal resources taken.

Highlights.name: On-site Workforce Management
Highlights.description: kelly helps organizations offload hiring and team management tasks associated with a high-volume, temporary workforce.

Highlights.name: Business Process Outsourcing
Highlights.description: By outsourcing a portion of your processes to Kelly,  you’ll increase productivity while decreasing operational expense.

enhanced_description: Kelly Services, established in 1946, is a pioneer in the staffing industry, annually connecting over 450,000 individuals globally with opportunities. They offer comprehensive talent solutions including Temporary and Contract Staffing, Direct Hire, Master Vendor Programs, Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO), On-site Workforce Management, and Business Process Outsourcing. With deep expertise across diverse industries and a global network, Kelly Services aims to match the right talent with the right roles, driving personal growth and organizational excellence by bringing expertise together with real partnership.
key_use_cases: Matching the right talent with the right roles
Offloading hiring and team management tasks for high-volume temporary workforce
competitive_advantages: Pioneering history in the staffing industry since 1946
Global reach and network (connecting over 450,000 individuals annually worldwide)
Ability to reduce recruiting time and cost
Capacity to free up internal resources
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
scalability_features: Ability to connect over 450,000 individuals annually
Serves small, large, and global enterprises
